categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: In 3.5 ABY, during the Galactic Civil War, the Rebel Alliance established a temporary prefabricated base on Kile, a moon of the gas giant Zhar, to support the starfighter unit Rogue Squadron. Striking from the Kile base, Rogue Squadron conducted a raid on Imperial interests stationed at the nearby moon Gall.
